global.somethingWrong: Something went wrong, try again later

auth.loginToContinue: Log in to your Endpass account to access site actions
auth.signUpToContinue: Sign up to your Endpass account to access site actions
auth.iAccept: By continuing, you agree to Endpass's

compositeAuth.successAuthMessage: You are successfully authorized. This dialog will close in a few seconds.
compositeAuth.linkSentMessage: We've sent your authorization link to your email address. Please, open it in the same browser to sign in. If you don't see the email, check the spam folder and exclude Endpass from spam filters.

regularPasswordForm.title: Log in to your Endpass account to access site actions

createPassword.title: Create regular password
createPassword.description: You have no regular password for the Endpass account. This password for login only.
createPassword.sendError: Something went wrong while sending the code. Please, try again
createPassword.confirmError: Something went wrong while creating a password. Please, try again

regularPasswordRecover.title: Change password
regularPasswordRecover.sendError: Something went wrong while sending the code. Please, try again
regularPasswordRecover.recoveryError: Something went wrong while password recovering. Please, try again

emailCode.title: Verify email
emailCode.description: We've just emailed a 6-digit code to {email}. Enter the code below to confirm.
emailCode.sendError: Something went wrong while sending the code. Please, try again

otp.title: Verify OTP code
otp.description: Enter the 6 digit code generated by your authenticator app.

recoverOtpSms.title: Disable OTP setting via SMS
recoverOtpSms.titlePhoneNotExist: You don't have the registered phone number
recoverOtpSms.sendSmsError: Something went wrong while sending SMS. Please try again
recoverOtpSms.recoverError: Something went wrong. Please try again

scopes.allowScopes: Application requests following scopes. Press the "Allow" button to grant these permissions.

account.donationError: Something went wrong. Try request donation later!

createWallet.passwordDescription: Please define password for your wallet account. This password must NOT be equal with the regular password
createWallet.recoverySubtitle: The words below are called your Seed Phrase. It enables you accessing your Endpass and restore your wallet. Notice that the order of the words is significant, and it is recognized while checking.
createWallet.error: Something went wrong while creating the new Wallet
createWallet.seedConfirmation: Yes, I've written down the words and stored them in a secure place.

walletCreateError.error: Something went wrong while trying to check Wallet existence

consentProvider.title: Permissions
consentProvider.loadScopesError: Something went wrong while loading scopes.
consentProvider.urlError: Please, add the 'consent_challenge' param in URL, and try again!

loginProvider.notWorkingError: Sorry, the login provider is temporarily not working.

loginProviderPassword.loginChallenge: Please, add the 'login_challenge' param in URL, and try again!

components.notFound: Sorry, the place is not found.

rateLimit.title: The rate limit exceeded!
rateLimit.toMuch: Too many requests from your IP address, please wait some time and try again.

user.donationSuccess: A donation request is successfully sent. In general, it takes some time before you will receive funds.

uploadDocument.errorSizeLimit: Size of file is more than 10Mb, please select other file.

auth.failedToCheckStatus: Failed to check Oauth login status
auth.authCanceled: Authentication is canceled by the user!

requests.gasTooLow: Transaction gas is too low. Try to increase gas price or gas limit.

uploadDocument.default: Something went wrong while file uploading.
uploadDocument.exist: File already exists, please upload another file.
uploadDocument.invalidFile: The uploaded file is broken or has an unknown format.

signer.typedData: Sign typed data is not supported yet!

mode.notLogged: You are not logged in at your identity server. Please, log in with your identity provider, come back to this page, and try again.
mode.serverInvalid: The URL you have entered does not point to a valid identity server. Please, check the address and try again.
